trans-unit.source: **Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
Represents a group of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref> objects that is used to apply multiple effects to a visible object.
trans-unit.target: 그룹을 나타냅니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"> </xref> 표시 되는 개체에 여러 효과 적용 하는 데 사용 되는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The order in which effects are added to a group affects the final visual representation of the content that the effects are applied to.
trans-unit.target: 효과 그룹에 추가 되는 순서는 최종 시각적을 효과에 적용 되는 내용으로 영향을 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: The effects are chained so that the visual of the first effect is used as the source of the second.
trans-unit.target: 첫 번째 효과의 시각적 개체에서 두 번째의 원본으로 사용 되도록 효과 연결 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: This logic is followed through all subsequent effects within the effect group.
trans-unit.target: 이 논리 효과 그룹 내의 모든 후속 효과 다음 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The following image shows the effect that a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowBitmapEffect> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.OuterGlowBitmapEffect> have when added to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 그림에 나와 효과는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowBitmapEffect>및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.OuterGlowBitmapEffect>했을 때 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> 에 추가</xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.OuterGlowBitmapEffect> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowBitmapEffect>

trans-unit.source: The first button has the drop shadow applied first and the outer glow applied last.
trans-unit.target: 첫 번째 단추는 그림자가 먼저 적용 되 고 마지막으로 적용 하는 외부 광선에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: In the second button, the order is reversed.
trans-unit.target: 두 번째 단추의 순서가 반대로 되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: ![Affect of an effect's order in a BitmapEffectGroup](~/add/media/effectgrouporder.PNG "Affect of an effect's order in a BitmapEffectGroup") Effects in a BitmapEffectGroup
trans-unit.target: ![BitmapEffectGroup에서 효과 순서의 영향을](~/add/media/effectgrouporder.PNG "BitmapEffectGroup에서 효과 순서의 영향을") BitmapEffectGroup에서 효과

trans-unit.source: **Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectGroup"></xref> class.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
Gets or sets the children of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectGroup"></xref>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: The children of the effects group as a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection"></xref>.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectGroup.Children*> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectGroup.Children%2A> dependency property.
To be added.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 수정 가능한 복사본을 생성 하기 위해이 메서드는 고정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>개체 (또는 모든 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>개체).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version.
trans-unit.target: 편의 위해이 메서드는 상속 된 버전을 숨깁니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 복제 된 개체의 <> </> *> 속성은 됩니다 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 경우에 원본의 <> </> *> 속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 수정 가능한 복사본을 생성 하기 위해이 메서드는 고정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>개체 (또는 모든 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>개체).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version.
trans-unit.target: 편의 위해이 메서드는 상속 된 버전을 숨깁니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 복제 된 개체의 <> </> *> 속성은 됩니다 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 경우에 원본의 <> </> *> 속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>합니다.
